::Savanna::

She was getting restless.  She sat in her lion mode and waited.  She 
hated this, not being able to do anything.  She walked past Blurr, 
and out of the room.  She wanderd the halls, trying to keep from 
going nuts with bordem.  She wanted to dig her claws into someone, 
preferrable a Pred.  But she had to bide her time and wait.
